jobDescription: Blizzard’s games don’t just begin with game ideas, or end once those games are released. A lot more goes into the creation of a Blizzard product than the work of developers—and we support our games for years after they’re in the hands of gamers world-wide. Global Insights works closely with Blizzard’s game and business teams to produce insights and models that enable us to meet and exceed our gameplay and business goals.
